sentences.sentence: Even when presented with examples of genuine contrition, children still need help to become aware of the complexities of saying sorry.
sentences.translation: 即使孩子们看到了真诚悔过的例子，他们仍然需要别人来帮助他们理解道歉的复杂性。

sentences.sentence: But even when presented with examples of genuine contrition, children still need help to become a ware of the complexities of saying sorry.
sentences.translation: 但是，即使孩子们看到了真诚悔过的案例，他们仍然需要帮助来理解道歉的复杂性。

sentences.sentence: But Mr Blair evinced no real contrition.
sentences.translation: 但是，布莱尔没有真正忏悔。
